title: Remove x12 from LPs, add BUYBACK/BURN POT.
body:
Currently the structure for LP gives 72x:

CAKE-BNB FLIP 30x
BUSD-BNB FLIP 8x
ADA-BNB FLIP 1x
BAND-BNB FLIP 2x
DOT-BNB FLIP 2x 
EOS-BNB FLIP 1x
LINK-BNB FLIP 2x
USDT-BUSD FLIP 1x
TWT-BNB FLP 1x
XVS-BNB FLP 1x
ETH-BNB FLP 2x
BTCB-BNB FLP 2x 
ALPHA-BNB FLP 1x
USDT-BNB FLP 2x
XRP-BNB FLP 1x
ATOM-BNB FLP 1x
YFII-BNB FLP 1x
DAI-BNB FLP 1x
XTZ-BNB FLP 0.5x
BCH-BNB FLP 0.5x
YFI-BNB FLIP 2x
UNI-BNB FLIP 2x
FIL-BNB FLIP 1x
INJ-BNB FLIP 1x
USDC-BNB FLIP 1x
SXP-BNB FLIP 2x
CTK-BNB FLIP 2x

The goal for pancake swap is to create a big TVL (total value locked) and be the #1 Exchange on BSC so we are going to need alot pools. However the sell pressure is still going to be to high with the current structure, what we would like to propose is:

x12 goes towards a BURN/BUYBACK POT which we would decide later how to divide and use it but this POT will help with few things:

1. The lottery will have a bigger impact/effect since there is a constant buyback/burn coming from the x12 so the lottery burn is more significant.

2. Hopefully will help stabilize the CAKE prize more, less sell pressure and buyback to make the prize more stable so more investors wants to join. 

Currently the APYs are still very high compared to other finance pools, and it needs to go down. Either the price will go down and the APYs fall with it, or we find a way to stabilize the price (by lowering the APYs) but not let the price fall with it.

An example of how we could achieve x12 for a BURN/BUYBACK pot:

- x5 from CAKE-BNB
- x2 from BUSD-BNB
- x1 from BAND-BNB
- x1 from DOT-BNB
- x1 from LINK-BNB
- x1 from YFI-BNB 
- x1 from UNI-BNB 

So we lower the rewards according to above, and use this as a BURN/BUYBACK POT. We keep the x60 for farms, hopefully this will help even more to stabilize the price.

If you like this suggestion please vote YES, if you think its a bad idea please vote NO.
author: 0x3e8734Ec146C981E3eD1f6b582D447DDE701d90c
